desc.description: ID>/authority ID.The content in <> is variable.

is_descending.description: 是否逆序， false：不逆序，true:逆序

operator.description: 操作符, $eq为相等，$neq为不等，$lt为小于，$gt为大于，$lne为小于等于， $gne为大于等于

is_descending.description: 是否逆序， false：不逆序，true:逆序

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

v1AddonsIdentifyRequest.description:
*
The request value of the POST /v1/addons/identify,
used when the plugin in the registration process implements
the extension point of the registered plugin.

v1AddonsIdentifyResponse.description:
*
The response value of the POST /v1/addons/identify,
used when the plugin in the registration process implements
the extension point of the registered plugin.

faildDelDevice.description: 设备删除失败 数组

faildDelGroup.description: 设备组删除失败 数组

faildDelTemplate.description: 模板删除失败 数组

path.description: 当前设备属性 or 遥测id 路径

expression.description: 数据来源设备的路径：设备id + 属性or遥测id

description.description: 可用于承载id 与名称的映射 便于展示

v1IdentifyResponse.description:
*
The response value of the GET /v1/identify,
used when the plugin registered.

v1ImplementedAddons.description:
*
message plugin declares implemented other plugin extension point.

templateAttrObject.title:
repeated Attribute attributes = 3;
api.core.v1.EntityResponse templateAttrObject = 1 [(grpc.gateway.protoc_gen_openapiv2.options.openapiv2_field) = {description: "属性列表对象"}];

direction.description: 关系方向 from or to   目前只填： from

relationType.description: 关系类型 目前只填： contain

targetType.description: 来源设备类型 目前只填:device

id.description: 属性 or  命令 标识符id

v1StatusResponse.description:
*
The request value of the GET /v1/Status.
used when the tkeel checks the status of plugins regularly.

v1TenantDisableRequest.description:
*
The request value of the POST /v1/tenant/disable,
used when the tenant administrator disables the plugin.

v1TenantDisableResponse.description:
*
The response value of the POST /v1/tenant/disable,
used when the tenant administrator disables the plugin.

v1TenantEnableRequest.description:
*
The request value of the POST /v1/tenant/enable,
used when the tenant administrator enables the plugin.

v1TenantEnableResponse.description:
*
The response value of the POST /v1/tenant/enable,
used when the tenant administrator enables the plugin.
